features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard with overview statistics, charts (donut and bar), task table, and resource utilization analysis. Includes real-time search and filtering capabilities.

features.name: Project Management
features.description: Complete CRUD operations for projects with priority tracking, aggregations (task counts, completion percentages), and status management (active, archived, deleted).

features.name: Task Management
features.description: Task CRUD with multi-resource hour tracking, status workflows (Backlog, In Progress, Done, Cancelled), deadline management, and task completion tracking.

features.name: Resource Management
features.description: Resource tracking with capacity planning, utilization charts, role management, and soft delete support.

features.name: Reports Generation
features.description: PDF and Excel export functionality for projects and tasks, integrated with n8n workflows for automated report generation.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Login page for user authentication and session management.

features.name: User Preferences
features.description: User settings page for managing name, avatar, and theme preferences.

features.name: Theme Management
features.description: Dark mode and light mode support with density settings (comfortable/compact), localStorage persistence, and system preference detection.

features.name: Navigation Header
features.description: Main navigation with links to Dashboard, Tasks, Projects, Reports, theme toggle button, and user profile section.

features.name: Search and Filter
features.description: Real-time search by name/ID/project with filters for status, priority, and resource. Includes keyboard shortcuts integration.

features.name: Data Tables
features.description: TanStack React Table implementation with sortable columns, hideable columns, empty states, row actions, and hover effects.

features.name: Audit Logging
features.description: Middleware that tracks all CREATE/UPDATE/DELETE operations with before/after state snapshots for compliance and debugging.

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Centralized error handling middleware with Zod validation error formatting and PostgreSQL constraint error handling.

features.name: n8n Workflow Integration
features.description: Fire-and-forget workflow triggers for automation on entity changes (project-created, task-created, task-updated events).

features.name: Database Connection
features.description: PostgreSQL connection pool setup with environment variable configuration and connection management.

features.name: API Wrapper
features.description: Generic fetch wrapper for API calls with error handling and base URL configuration.

features.name: Form Validation
features.description: Client-side and server-side validation using React Hook Form and Zod schemas with custom refinement rules.

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI component library including Button, Input, Select, Card, Badge, ProgressBar, Spinner, and StatCard with multiple variants and states.

features.name: Chart Components
features.description: Data visualization components including donut charts, bar charts, and resource utilization charts for dashboard analytics.

features.name: Type Definitions
features.description: TypeScript interfaces for Project, Task, and Resource entities with complete type safety across the application.

features.name: Health Check
features.description: API health check endpoint for monitoring service availability.
